Original: You're going to accept that quest...?
The client is the researcher who asked
for the animal remains and the book.
[Page]
He used the knowledge gleaned from the
book to revive the carcass... and it
turned out to be a horrifying beast.
[Page]
That is as much as I know, for... the
client fell victim to the beast and
is no longer with us.
[Page]
But he wanted you to defeat it. By all
accounts, the beast escaped toward
the [Color:5]Lush Woodlands[Color:0].
[Page]
In addition to explorers, many people
of Tharsis go there. We cannot allow
it to roam free.
[Page]
This is a dangerous request, but I have no
one else to turn to. So, [Guild]
Guild, kismet be with you.
[Page]
And as ever, I shall await your
swift return!
Translation: You're going to accept that quest...?
The client is the researcher who asked
for the animal remains and the book.
[Page]
He used the knowledge gleaned from the
book to revive the carcass... and it
turned out to be a horrifying beast.
[Page]
That is as much as I know, for... the
client fell victim to the beast and
is no longer with us.
[Page]
But he wanted you to defeat it. By all
accounts, the beast escaped toward
the [Color:5]Lush Woodlands[Color:0].
[Page]
In addition to explorers, many people
of Tharsis go there. We cannot allow
it to roam free.
[Page]
This is a dangerous request, but I have no
one else to turn to. So, [Guild]
Guild, kismet be with you.
[Page]
And as ever, I shall await your
swift return!

Original: Welcome back! I have heard that you
were successful in subduing the beast.
Thank goodness... I was worried.
[Page]
Who could have foreseen the ultimate
fate of that beastly corpse preserved
in the ice?
[Page]
And more importantly, what was the
client thinking, bringing it back to
life? I suppose we will never know...
[Page]
But I again thank you. I rely on your
[Guild] Guild now for all of my
most difficult requests.
Translation: Welcome back! I have heard that you
were successful in subduing the beast.
Thank goodness... I was worried.
[Page]
Who could have foreseen the ultimate
fate of that beastly corpse preserved
in the ice?
[Page]
And more importantly, what was the
client thinking, bringing it back to
life? I suppose we will never know...
[Page]
But I again thank you. I rely on your
[Guild] Guild now for all of my
most difficult requests.

Original: While hunting the revived beast
through the Woodlands, you see a
soldier fleeing in hysterics.
Translation: While hunting the revived beast
through the Woodlands, you see a
soldier fleeing in hysterics.

Original: You try to elicit the details of the
situation from the soldier, but he
only screams as he shakes you off.
Translation: You try to elicit the details of the
situation from the soldier, but he
only screams as he shakes you off.

Original: "L-Let go! Let go of me! Back there!
A--A thing! A thing with, with hideous
wings!
[Page]
"M-My allies were all e-eaten!
Help! Monster!"
[Page]
There is nothing else you can get out
of the soldier between his piteous
wailing.
[Page]
You let go of him and he runs at a
full sprint from the area.
Translation: "L-Let go! Let go of me! Back there!
A--A thing! A thing with, with hideous
wings!
[Page]
"M-My allies were all e-eaten!
Help! Monster!"
[Page]
There is nothing else you can get out
of the soldier between his piteous
wailing.
[Page]
You let go of him and he runs at a
full sprint from the area.

Original: The beast the soldier feared so must
be the revived monster you hunt. As
expected, it is a powerful enemy...
Translation: The beast the soldier feared so must
be the revived monster you hunt. As
expected, it is a powerful enemy...

Original: As you walk the Woodlands, searching
for the beast, you arrive in front of
an altar.
[Page]
You see a trail of blood leading from
south to north, with pieces of armor
strewn throughout.
[Page]
It is certain that they belonged to
soldiers who fell prey to the revived
creature...
Translation: As you walk the Woodlands, searching
for the beast, you arrive in front of
an altar.
[Page]
You see a trail of blood leading from
south to north, with pieces of armor
strewn throughout.
[Page]
It is certain that they belonged to
soldiers who fell prey to the revived
creature...

Original: In front of the altar, you discover
copious bloodstains and scraps of
armor at your feet.
[Page]
You look closely and see that the
trail of blood leads from south to
north...
Translation: In front of the altar, you discover
copious bloodstains and scraps of
armor at your feet.
[Page]
You look closely and see that the
trail of blood leads from south to
north...

Original: It is certain that the blood belonged
to soldiers who fell prey to the
revived creature...
Translation: It is certain that the blood belonged
to soldiers who fell prey to the
revived creature...

Original: As you move into the hidden regions
of the Woodlands, you see that the
bloodstains continue into the door!
[Page]
There may be a powerful beast lurking
beyond... You ensure that you are
fully prepared before opening it.
Translation: As you move into the hidden regions
of the Woodlands, you see that the
bloodstains continue into the door!
[Page]
There may be a powerful beast lurking
beyond... You ensure that you are
fully prepared before opening it.

Original: Once you ready yourself and open the
door, a strong gust of force blows
toward you!
Translation: Once you ready yourself and open the
door, a strong gust of force blows
toward you!

Original: Past the cloud of dust raised by the
wind, you see a colossal form with
glowing eyes.
[Page]
Here is the ancient beast who defied
fate, devouring its own benefactor
as well as the soldiers!
[Page]
You fearlessly clutch your weapons
and charge forth to defeat this
gruesome foe!
Translation: Past the cloud of dust raised by the
wind, you see a colossal form with
glowing eyes.
[Page]
Here is the ancient beast who defied
fate, devouring its own benefactor
as well as the soldiers!
[Page]
You fearlessly clutch your weapons
and charge forth to defeat this
gruesome foe!

Original: The fierce battle between you and the
beast comes to its end when the thing
gives one final roar!
[Page]
The beast given life in defiance of
fate will return to its slumber...
[Page]
The request is now complete! You need
only head to the bar and report your
accomplishment whenever you can!
Translation: The fierce battle between you and the
beast comes to its end when the thing
gives one final roar!
[Page]
The beast given life in defiance of
fate will return to its slumber...
[Page]
The request is now complete! You need
only head to the bar and report your
accomplishment whenever you can!
